meanings.sent1: The boy was the antsiest in the class, always tapping his foot and shifting in his seat.
meanings.sent2: She felt antsiest when waiting for the test results to be announced.
meanings.sent3: The antsiest squirrel in the park kept darting around, unable to sit still for a moment.
meanings.sent4: As the deadline approached, he grew antsier, like a squirrel with too much energy.
meanings.sent5: The antsiest kitten in the litter was constantly exploring and climbing everything in sight.

meanings.sent1: The antsiest student in the room was worried about the upcoming presentation.
meanings.sent2: She became antsier as the dark clouds gathered overhead.
meanings.sent3: The antsiest puppy in the litter whined nervously during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: His heart raced, feeling antsier with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The antsiest bird in the flock chirped anxiously, sensing a predator nearby.

meanings.sent1: The antsiest customer at the store tapped their foot impatiently in line.
meanings.sent2: She grew antsier as the slow traffic delayed her arrival.
meanings.sent3: The antsiest toddler in the group threw a small tantrum when the toy wouldn't work.
meanings.sent4: His impatience made him the antsiest person in the waiting room.
meanings.sent5: The antsiest squirrel in the park chattered loudly, demanding attention from passersby.
